sn35.88:1.1: Atha kho āyasmā puṇṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā …pe… ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā puṇṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.88:1.2: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetu, yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn35.88:2.1: “Santi kho, puṇṇa, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.88:2.2: Tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35.88:2.3: Tassa taṃ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjati nandī.
sn35.88:2.6: santi kho, puṇṇa, manoviññeyyā dhammā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.88:2.7: Tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35.88:2.8: Tassa taṃ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjati nandī.
sn35.88:3.1: Santi kho, puṇṇa, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.88:3.2: Tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati, tassa taṃ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato nirujjhati nandī.
sn35.88:3.4: santi kho, puṇṇa, manoviññeyyā dhammā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.88:3.5: Tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati, tassa taṃ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato nirujjhati nandī.
sn35.88:4.1: Iminā tvaṃ, puṇṇa, mayā saṃkhittena ovādena ovadito katamasmiṃ janapade viharissasī”ti?
sn35.88:4.2: “Atthi, bhante, sunāparanto nāma janapado, tatthāhaṃ viharissāmī”ti.
sn35.88:5.3: Sace taṃ, puṇṇa, sunāparantakā manussā akkosissanti paribhāsissanti, tatra te, puṇṇa, kinti bhavissatī”ti?
sn35.88:6.1: “Sace maṃ, bhante, sunāparantakā manussā akkosissanti paribhāsissanti, tatra me evaṃ bhavissati:
sn35.88:6.2: ‘bhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, subhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, yaṃ me nayime pāṇinā pahāraṃ dentī’ti.
sn35.88:7.1: “Sace pana te, puṇṇa, sunāparantakā manussā pāṇinā pahāraṃ dassanti, tatra pana te, puṇṇa, kinti bhavissatī”ti?
sn35.88:8.1: “Sace me, bhante, sunāparantakā manussā pāṇinā pahāraṃ dassanti, tatra me evaṃ bhavissati:
sn35.88:8.2: ‘bhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, subhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, yaṃ me nayime leḍḍunā pahāraṃ dentī’ti.
sn35.88:9.1: “Sace pana te, puṇṇa, sunāparantakā manussā leḍḍunā pahāraṃ dassanti, tatra pana te, puṇṇa, kinti bhavissatī”ti?
sn35.88:10.1: “Sace me, bhante, sunāparantakā manussā leḍḍunā pahāraṃ dassanti, tatra me evaṃ bhavissati:
sn35.88:10.2: ‘bhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, subhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, yaṃ me nayime daṇḍena pahāraṃ dentī’ti.
sn35.88:11.1: “Sace pana puṇṇa, sunāparantakā manussā daṇḍena pahāraṃ dassanti, tatra pana te, puṇṇa, kinti bhavissatī”ti?
sn35.88:12.1: “Sace me, bhante, sunāparantakā manussā daṇḍena pahāraṃ dassanti, tatra me evaṃ bhavissati:
sn35.88:12.2: ‘bhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, subhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, yaṃ me nayime satthena pahāraṃ dentī’ti.
sn35.88:13.1: “Sace pana te, puṇṇa, sunāparantakā manussā satthena pahāraṃ dassanti, tatra pana te, puṇṇa, kinti bhavissatī”ti?
sn35.88:14.1: “Sace me, bhante, sunāparantakā manussā satthena pahāraṃ dassanti, tatra me evaṃ bhavissati:
sn35.88:14.2: ‘bhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, subhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, yaṃ maṃ nayime tiṇhena satthena jīvitā voropentī’ti.
sn35.88:15.1: “Sace pana taṃ, puṇṇa, sunāparantakā manussā tiṇhena satthena jīvitā voropessanti, tatra pana te, puṇṇa, kinti bhavissatī”ti?
sn35.88:16.1: “Sace maṃ, bhante, sunāparantakā manussā tiṇhena satthena jīvitā voropessanti, tatra me evaṃ bhavissati:
sn35.88:16.2: ‘santi kho tassa bhagavato sāvakā kāyena ca jīvitena ca aṭṭīyamānā harāyamānā jigucchamānā satthahārakaṃ pariyesanti, taṃ me idaṃ apariyiṭṭhaññeva satthahārakaṃ laddhan’ti.
sn35.88:17.2: Sakkhissasi kho tvaṃ, puṇṇa, iminā damūpasamena samannāgato sunāparantasmiṃ janapade vatthuṃ.
sn35.88:18.1: Atha kho āyasmā puṇṇo bhagavato vacanaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena sunāparanto janapado tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
sn35.88:18.2: Anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena sunāparanto janapado tadavasari.
sn35.88:18.3: Tatra sudaṃ āyasmā puṇṇo sunāparantasmiṃ janapade viharati.
sn35.88:18.4: Atha kho āyasmā puṇṇo tenevantaravassena pañcamattāni upāsakasatāni paṭivedesi.
sn35.88:19.1: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu …pe… ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
sn35.88:19.2: “yo so, bhante, puṇṇo nāma kulaputto bhagavatā saṅkhittena ovādena ovadito, so kālaṅkato.
sn35.88:20.1: “Paṇḍito, bhikkhave, puṇṇo kulaputto, paccapādi dhammassānudhammaṃ, na ca maṃ dhammādhikaraṇaṃ vihesesi.
